item.title: How to enable syntax highlighting and auto-completion for NS-3 in Doom Emacs?
item.description: If doom is your favorite editor and you want to work on ns-3 with doom then follow these steps: Have doom emacs and ns-3 installed. Make sure your init.el file has cc with lsp enabled: (cc +lsp) You will need to generate a file called compile_commands.json.
